parameters.name: delayTime
parameters.description: Controls the delay time in milliseconds (0ms to 1000ms)

parameters.name: feedback
parameters.description: Controls the feedback amount (0% = single echo, 100% = infinite)

parameters.name: mix
parameters.description: Controls the wet/dry mix (0% = dry only, 100% = wet only)

parameters.name: bypass
parameters.description: Bypasses the echo effect when enabled
